resources.string: Use this timer to keep track of how long you want to study
This page will keep track of the courses you are currently enrolled in.
This page will have your current grades that you have inputed into the app. It will also contain calculations so you can know how well you are doing in your classes.

This page will be able to keep track of all your upcoming assignments. You will be able to add new assignments here and see which are coming up along with info on them. Notifications can be set here as well
